name: elpwd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

comment: Membership in a power class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
